text.disguiseheads.title: DisguiseHeads Settings
text.disguiseheads.enable.enablePlayerDi: Disguise players wearing a player head
text.disguiseheads.enable.enableArmorsta: Disguise armorstands wearing a player head
text.disguiseheads.enable.hideArmorstand: Hide the head of armorstands wearing a player head, so the head has the same size as a normal player head
